name: Fry'n nom
description:
You're a fox. A hungry fox. You like fried veggies. Cabbage, carrots and broccoli. But don't forget to fry them! Use fireballs to fry veggies.  (Aim + Left-click)

However throwing fireballs and passing time makes you hungry. A hungry fox is not a happy fox. Try to stay happy! Fight the hunger!

Oh and there's pumpkins, those are especially delicious, no need to fry them. Some say those have special shrink powers when you eat them. (Activate with Right-click)

But beware your tomato allergy. The veggies know about your weakness and will exploit it to the fullest. They don't like being fried. Dodge their tomatoes. (w, a, s, d)

And did I mention your nose can fire a laser beam? (Activate with Middle-Click, 4sec cooldown)

Time to nom some fried veggies!

Sources of magnificent artwork:
https://opengameart.org/content/grain
https://opengameart.org/content/bevouliin-free-fence-game-background-for-game-developers
https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-art-replacement-gui-text
https://openclipart.org/share
